item.title: Fed’s Interest-Rate Approach Keeps It on Collision Course With Trump
item.description: The central bank signals little urgency to cut interest rates despite demands from President Trump for lower borrowing costs.

item.title: The Progressive Regulator Winning Over the Populist Right
item.description: Lina Khan wants to overthrow “the autocrats of trade.”

item.title: The Crane That Ruined Florence’s Skyline Is Gone
item.description: A reviled crane used during the expansion of the Uffizi Galleries was taken down this week after years of protests.
